document_data.mainbody:
Jaena was an elf girl traveling along the High Road between Neverwinter and Luskan during the late 15 century DR.
Jaena had light brown hair in a long ponytail.
Some time around , Jaena and her dog Guen joined the merchants caravan of Tollin and his crew going from Neverwinter to Luskan, accompanied by members of the Order of the Burning Dawn, in order to meet up with her sister in Luskan. During the journey, the caravan was attacked by mercenaries hired by the Order of the Gilded Eye.
